flawed_nl_solution:
Aliyah packs her lunch ½ the time, so in 180 school days / 2 = she packs her lunch <<180/2=90>>90 times.
Becky packs her lunch ½ as much as Aliyah, so 90 times / 2 = <<90/2=54>>54 times a year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45.0, not 54.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
